title: The Topic Switches to the Fall of Assyria
html:
2 Nephi 24:25. "The Assyrian in my land" Probably referring to the Assyrian attack on the kingdom of Israel (721 B.C.) and on the kingdom of Judah (701 B.C.).

2 Nephi 24:25. "His yoke depart from off them" (emphasis added) To clarify the pronouns "his" and "them," the Assyrian's yoke will be removed from covenant Israel.
